Player History
Drafted in 22nd round, 339th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Injured on 4/11/2017 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 7-8 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/29/2017...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $608,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 6/15/2021 (Going to CIN: P Jorge Echevarria. Going to SF: P Henry Wygant, LF Felix Sanchez)...
